title: Unior Master Kit & Home Kit pack tool boxes for any mechanic, plus new bike tools inside too!
content:
Slovenian toolmaker Unior expands their EU-made bike tool & toolbox lineup with new Master & Home Kits so every type of bike mechanic can be ready for the next repair. Beyond simply packing in every tool you could ever need, the two biggest customizable toolboxes are also available empty so you can build your own

The post Unior Master Kit & Home Kit pack tool boxes for any mechanic, plus new bike tools inside too! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
